description: This course explores the relationship between concert music and popular music of the 20th century. Students learn the basic elements of music and critical listening skills, apply those skills to a variety of music from concert and popular styles and analyze the relationship between the styles. Students use a variety of activities, including group work and individual presentations, to achieve these goals. Offered alternately with Music 131 and 132.
name: Mahler to Madonna
title: From Mahler to Madonna: 20th Century Music
